description: This file implements a MongoDB repository class for managing skills and lessons, providing CRUD operations, index management, and pagination/filtering.

classes.name: MongoCatalogRepository
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations and index management for skills and lessons stored in MongoDB.

methods.name: None __init__(self, db: AsyncIOMotorDatabase)
methods.description: Initializes the repository with the database connection and collections for skills and lessons.

methods.name: None ensure_indexes(self)
methods.description: Creates necessary indexes on skills and lessons collections for efficient querying and uniqueness constraints.

methods.name: Tuple[List[Dict[str,Any]],int] list_skills( self, category: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, page: int = 1, page_size: int = 20, search: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of skills, optionally filtered by category, difficulty, and search term.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get_skill_by_slug(self, slug: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a skill document by its unique slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_skill(self, skill: SkillModel)
methods.description: Creates a new skill document in the database.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] update_skill(self, slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates an existing skill identified by slug with provided data.

methods.name: bool delete_skill(self, slug: str)
methods.description: Deletes a skill by slug, also removing associated lessons.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] list_lessons_for_skill(self, skill_slug: str)
methods.description: Lists lessons associated with a specific skill.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get_lesson_by_slug(self, lesson_slug: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a lesson document by its slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_lesson(self, lesson: LessonModel)
methods.description: Creates a new lesson in the database.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] update_lesson(self, slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates an existing lesson identified by slug.

methods.name: bool delete_lesson(self, slug: str)
methods.description: Deletes a lesson by its slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _serialize_skill(self, doc: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Converts a skill document from database format to a serializable dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _serialize_lesson(self, doc: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Converts a lesson document from database format to a serializable dictionary.
